actions.committee: House Committee on Energy and Commerce
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Energy and Commerce
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Energy and Air Quality.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Energy and Air Quality

official_title: To establish an Energy Policy Council to develop a National Energy Plan and monitor the implementation thereof, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Establishes an Energy Policy Council within the Executive Office of the President to develop a National Energy Plan and a plan for comprehensive federal departmental reform to eliminate wasteful spending and overlapping programs, including by establishing a consolidated entity to be known as the Department of Energy Policy.

titles.title: To establish an Energy Policy Council to develop a National Energy Plan and monitor the implementation thereof, and for other purposes.
